alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 1:08PM MST until January 07 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/ SATURDAY TO 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches for valleys. 4 to 6 inches for Lolo Pass and higher benches. * WHERE...Highway 93 Sula to Lost Trail Pass, Lolo Pass, Elk River, Highway 11 Pierce to Headquarters, Dixie, Elk City, Pierce, and Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass. * WHEN...From 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/ Saturday to 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains
